items.sentence: You've survived everything that has happened to you so far.

What you're saying now has nothing to do with the question.
Though seriously injured, he managed to get to a telephone.
He tried hard only to find that he was not fit for the job.
Tom Jackson makes frequent use of hyperbole in his writing.
It makes no difference to me whether you wear a tie or not.
Tom asked Mary if John was planning to stay in Boston long.
There used to be a time when we told each other everything.
